message: Hi Bob, here's my proposal: I'll receive $51.28 and you'll receive $48.72. Accepting now ensures we both get more value since each round reduces the total by 5%. Looking forward to a fair and efficient outcome!
Let's split it evenly. We both get the same amount, and we don't have to worry about further inflation.

Bob, your proposal is generous and, given the inflation penalty, better than what I could expect by holding out. An even split now yields me effectively more than what a counteroffer would bring as the rounds progress due to further devaluation. I'm happy to accept your offer.
